content:
# List of intents:
[
    {
        "intentId": "NAI637910",
        "intentName": "NetworkAccessInquiry",
        "intent_description": "an inquiry or concern regarding accessing the Company Network or Virtual Private Network (VPN) and general inquiries regarding Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), PingID, Single Sign On (SSO)- create a name for the intent.",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "INTy261",
                "slotName": "InquiryType",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the type of inquiry the user has regarding network access or authentication methods.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "CompanyNetwork",
                    "VPN",
                    "MFA",
                    "PingID",
                    "SSO"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "SpCon328",
                "slotName": "SpecificConcern",
                "slot_description": "Identifies the specific concern or issue the user is facing within the chosen inquiry type",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "ConnectionIssue",
                    "LoginProblem",
                    "MFASetup",
                    "PingIDQuery",
                    "SSOConfiguration"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "DevT241",
                "slotName": "DeviceType",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the type of device the user is using when accessing the network or authentication methods.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Desktop",
                    "Laptop",
                    "Mobile Phone"
                ]
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": "BT6371",
        "intentName": "EmailIssue",
        "intent_description": "refers to a problem or difficulty an individual is experiencing when trying to access their email account.",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotID": "EAppl2374",
                "slotName": "emailApplication",
                "slot_description": : "a software program or application that enables users to send, receive, and manage emails",
                "type": "String",
                "slot_description": "Microsoft Outlook",
            },
            {
                "slotID": "BR54681",
                "slotName": "browser",
                "slot_description": "a software application used to access and view information on the World Wide Web",
                "type": "String ",
                "possiblevalues": [
                    "Google Chrome, Mozila Firefox"
                ]
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "IntentId": "LAAdAcR525",
        "IntentName": "LocalAdminAccessRequest",
        "intent_description": "User requests local administrator access for tasks such as installing new software, accessing a system feature, or changing settings on their own local computer.",
        "Slots": [
            {
                "slotID": "AcRT637",
                "slotName": "AccessRequestType",
                "slot_description": "specifies the type of access the user is requesting, such as installing new software, accessing a specific system feature, or changing settings.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possiblevalues": [
                    "InstallSoftware",
                    " AccessFeature",
                    "ChangeSettings",
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotID": "SNa8472",
                "slotName": "SoftwareName",
                "SlotDescription": "If the access request is related to installing new software, this slot captures the name or type of software the user wants to install.",
                "Type": "String"
            },
            {
                "slotID": "FeatN2891",
                "slotName": "FeatureName",
                "slot_description": "If the access request is related to accessing a specific system feature, this slot captures the name or description of the feature.",
                "Type": "String",
                "possiblevalues": [
                    "Data Retrieval",
                    "File Management",
                    "Software Development",
                    "Financial Transactions",
                    "Analytics Dashboard",
                ],
            },
            {
                "slotName": "SetC301",
                "slotName": "SettingsChange",
                "slot_description": " If the access request is related to changing settings, this slot captures the nature of the settings the user wants to change.",
                "Type": "String"
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "IntentId": "ScIsSup301",
        "IntentName": "ScannerIssueSupport",
        "intent_description": "User reports issues with a scanner and requires assistance with configuration, setup, or troubleshooting.",
        "Slots": [
            {
                "slotID": "ScPr991",
                "slotName": "scannerProblem",
                "Type": "String",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the nature of the issue the user is facing with the scanner.",
                "possiblevalues": [
                    "Paper Jam",
                    "Not Scanning",
                    "Connection Issues",
                    "Other"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotID": "ScMod727",
                "slotName": "ScannerModel",
                "Type": "String",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the model or type of the scanner the user is encountering issues with."
            },
            {
                "slotID": "OpS7271",
                "slotName": "OperatingSystem",
                "Type": "String",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the user's operating system to tailor support based on the platform",
                "possiblevalues": [
                    "Windows",
                    "macOS",
                    "Linux",
                    "Other"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotID": "EMes8292",
                "slotName": "ErrorMessage",
                "Type": "String",
                "slot_description": "Allows the user to provide any error messages or specific details related to the scanner issue."
            }
        ]
    }
    {
        {
            "intentId": "REqLIn12",
            "intentName": "RequestLeaveInformation",
            "intent_description": "User has questions about or wants to request some sort of leave ",
            "slots": [
                {
                    "slotId": "LT63710",
                    "slotName": "leaveType",
                    "slot_description": "Type of leave the information was requested about.",
                    "type": "String ",
                    "possible_Values": [
                        "PTO",
                        "TimeOff",
                        "VacationBalance",
                        "ParentalLeave",
                        "JuryDuty",
                        "MilitaryDuty",
                        "SickLeave",
                        "LeaveOfAbsence"
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "slotId": "LSDa6429",
                    "slotName": "LeaveStartDate",
                    "slot_description": "Starting date of the requested leave",
                    "type": "String ",
                    "possible_Values": [
                        "dd-mm-yyyy",
                        "yyyy-dd-mm",
                        "mm-dd-yyyy",
                        "yyyy-mm-dd"
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "slotId": "LEDa60191",
                    "slotName": "LeaveEndDate",
                    "slot_description": "Ending date of the requested leave",
                    "type": "String ",
                    "possible_Values": [
                        "dd-mm-yyyy",
                        "yyyy-dd-mm",
                        "mm-dd-yyyy",
                        "yyyy-mm-dd"
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "slotId": "ReasL3891",
                    "slotName": "ReasonleaveType",
                    "slot_description": "Captures the reason or purpose for requesting the leave",
                    "type": "Sring ",
                }
            ]
        },
    }
]

Classify the  following utterance and extract all relevant slots:

"I'd like to take PTO to attend the wedding of my sister on 24th of October 2023. It'll take me almost 29 hours to reach the wedding destination. Therefore, I need 12 day of leave (not including week-ends). Please be informed, that I'll be out of the office from 13.10.23 till 30.10.23 inclusively and will be back on 31st of October 2023."

I want you to return your answer in json.  Imperative to consider:
All intents are provided in json format. 
Each intent has a unique ID associated with it that contains an upper case letters, numbers and lower case letters in a random combinations.
For each intent there are also slots associated with them.  Each slot will have a name, datatype, and description.  It may also include a field PossibleValues which means the slot must match one of the provided values. If any other values are present in the utterance, do not extract them, return "none" as the key value for the slot.  If any other slots are present in the utterance that are not in the list provided above, do not extract them. If no intents can be identified, please return: {“prediction_intent”: “none _of_the_above”}
Identify only one intent from the list provided above. The JSON should always have a key “output”.  The value of “output” should be a dictionary where the key of this dictionary is the intent id and the values is a subdictionary where the keys are the slot ids associated with the given intent and the values are the slot values. If you return your answer using slotNames you'll be penalized.
